task.summary: First step in the transition to Fragment Architecture
Some much needed steps in the right direction. This will become interesting.
Added the famous bottom navigation. More soon!
It's somewhat working, but needs LOADS of polishing
Getting closer to a running app
Now we're getting somewhere. I hope. I miss iOS development.
One small commit before a huge new attempt
